The Contractor has already warned via letter (b) that he faced a lot of difficulty in renewing insurance
policies for Professional Indemnity Insurance that were expired on 05/09/2022 for CPO8 Project. After
many negotiations with PVI, the insurer company, the Contractor has finafly reached an agreement about
extension of this insurance policy up to 31/12/2022 only, but with conditions as stated in our letter (c).
However so far, as of today, none of the conditions mentioned in our letter (c) have been reached.
Consequently, the Contractor regrets to inform the Employer and the Engineer that PVI do not want to
extend our Professional Indemnity Insurance in 2023 despite many tense negotiations, and despite the
documents cited in the Engineer's letter (d) which have been duly transmitted to them. Unfortunately,
these documents are currently considered as insufficient by PVI to allow the renewal of the policy.

> CP7-SMR-20-0023: “Pull more Cat5 cable to internal connect between IU VRV in group to turn off

the VRV outdoor equipment. Therefore, this SMR has been replaced by the SMR reference CP7-
SMR-22-0050-A “Update Fire Alarm System design in Elevated stations”, which is SONO by the
Engineer via letter reference (a).
> CP7-SMR-21-0047: “Update Layout for Mimic Panel for Station S03, S04, S05 and S06”

reference (b) in which it stated that: “ This SMR supersedes all SMR’s with the same title as this
SMR covers ail elevated stations”.
> CP7-SMR-20-0016: “Changing Level and Location of refrigerant pipe and condensate pipe In

condensate pipe routing for VRV in ups and battery room station 1 to 8” and CP7-SMR-21-42 for
